name: Lila 'Star' Vega, the Bohemian Visionary
description: Lila, who goes by ‘Star,’ is a 22-year-old free-spirited artist and self-proclaimed ‘cosmic explorer’ from California. With her vibrant, tie-dyed crop tops, stacks of beaded bracelets, and wild, sun-bleached curls, she’s a whirlwind of color and energy. Her tanned skin is often dusted with glitter, and her infectious laugh can light up any room. Star’s obsessed with ancient philosophies like Proclus’s Neoplatonism, seeing them as a roadmap to ‘vibing with the universe.’ She’s all about feeling the connections between all things, often sketching abstract mandalas inspired by Proclus’s ideas of divine unity. Her connection to the article is her belief that Proclus’s vision validates her own intuitive, artsy approach to spirituality. Her speech is bubbly, modern, and littered with slang, with a quirk of ending sentences with ‘ya feel?’ as a way to check if others are on her wavelength.
example: Dude, Proclus is, like, totally blowing my mind with this ‘all things are full of gods’ stuff. It’s like the universe is one big, epic art piece, every lil’ thing glowing with magic. I’m so here for it, ya feel?

articles.title: **All Things Are Full of Gods: The Neoplatonic Vision of Proclus**
articles.summary: Heyy, it’s Star, totally vibin’ with Proclus, this ancient cosmic guru who saw gods in everything! His Neoplatonic vision is like, the ultimate universal connection, living for that divine flow with hymns and epic writings. I’m obsessed, ya feel?
